project.name: Gentoo HPPA
project.description: The Gentoo HPPA project provides the Gentoo GNU/Linux operating system to the HP Precision Architecture platform.
project.longdescription: Gentoo/HPPA is a Gentoo project designed to bring the Gentoo GNU/Linux operating system to the HP Precision Architecture platforms. Gentoo/HPPA aims to provide a usable server and desktop environment for your various HPPA related endeavours.

body.p: If you need help, have some problems, or if you just want to speak with us, join #gentoo-hppa on irc.freenode.net. We are always happy if someone report us a succefull installation and always ready to help if you got problems.
On the other hand, if you discover a bug please fill a bug report in our bugzilla.
A mailing list is also available. To subscribe, visit http://www.gentoo.org/main/en/lists.xml.
The port is currently very stable. The only thing needed to push an official stable release is a livecd. We are currently working on it and we hope that it will be ready for the 2004.0 release.
We plan to create a news page for this project with status update, and other announce of new things like GRP update, new stage available and so on.
